Documentation: Somatic Variant Calling With Deep Learning¶

This is the index page for the project “Somatic Variant Calling With Deep Learning” by Daniel Biro (s1618820@sms.ed.ac.uk).

Description¶

MInf5 Dissertation Project about creating and evaluating a deep learning based somatic variant calling method.
